publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-718.3 Peter Peacock: Reform of Public Services-As an amendment to motion (S2M-718) in the name of David McLetchie, leave out from "acknowledges" to end and insert "supports the radical, demanding and relevant agenda set out in A Partnership for a Better Scotland including the delivery of excellent public services that put patients, pupils and victims first, ensure equality of access across urban and rural Scotland, devolve decision-making to front-line staff, establish national standards on which local excellence can be built, backed by inspection, and share best practice and action to tackle and turn around poor performance." Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*
